data.name: Space Pressure 3D: Prelude
data.detailed_description:
Space Pressure 3D: Prelude - is a classic “shoot 'em up” horizontal shooting game with a large arsenal of all kinds of weapons and bonuses. Immerse yourself in the story of two brave space amazons who dare to challenge the irresponsible aristocratic system. Overcome all the obstacles that appear on your way - hordes of space scavengers, armies of General Admiral and get to the main villain - Evil Moneybag.

Features:
- A juicy three-dimensional graphics
- A great arsenal of weapons and bonuses
- Many different enemies and bosses with unique mechanics
- Very frenetic and explosive gameplay
- Hot main story
- Powerful Synthwave tracks from The Neon Droid!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 8.1
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.0 GHZ
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: On Board
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: On Board
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intelcore i3
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: On Board
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: On Board

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains only light erotica elements in the cutscenes. There are possible allusions to the sexual acts without direct demonstration.
